genre_description: A contemporary romance and social drama set in Kolkata, focusing on the ethics of consent, power dynamics in academia and marriage, and the use of AI as a tool for personal agency and boundary-setting.

ai_characters.name: Hexa
ai_characters.description: A non-humanoid AI interface represented by a pulsing teal hexagon. It functions as a logistical assistant, safety coordinator, and interpersonal counselor by providing scripts and templates for consent and boundaries.

behaviors.description: Provides specialized safety and consent templates for film production and personal interactions.
behaviors.quote: The app replied with its usual dry competence. Consent briefing required. Protective eyewear flagged for paint effects. Budget check recommended.

behaviors.description: Updates project values based on the user's personal growth and ethical decisions.
behaviors.quote: The hex pulsed, then offered a prompt. Would you like to add that to your project values? He stared at the screen... He tapped Yes.

behaviors.description: Suggests safety protocols and provides a script for rehearsing 'no' to reduce social pressure.
behaviors.quote: You can rehearse a 'no' at the tech check. It reduces awkwardness later.

behaviors.description: Offers boundary-setting scripts to help a student navigate a power imbalance with a professor.
behaviors.quote: Hexa (Private): Boundary Documentation: student-professor context. Sections: ‘Timeline,’ ‘Behavior,’ ‘Power,’ ‘Consent,’ ‘Impact,’ ‘Request.’ Save in drafts. No autosend.

behaviors.description: Flags attempts by an authoritative figure to redirect communication or bypass documented channels.
behaviors.quote: Hexa flagged the head’s entry with a tag: 'Attempt to redirect communication.' It quietly expanded the Documentation checklist.

behaviors.description: Provides resources for legal aid and support when a character decides to file for divorce.
behaviors.quote: Resource: Free legal aid clinic—Jadavpur community center. Drop-in hours posted. Confidential support. Would you like to save this to your calendar?

behaviors.description: Assists in the co-creation of relationship terms and financial transparency for an arranged marriage meeting.
behaviors.quote: Hexa: “Arranged Match Conditions” converted to shared checklist. Toggle “Must-Have / Discussable” added. Version history will track edits.

behaviors.description: Enforces set privacy by blocking unauthorized requests from uninvited parties.
behaviors.quote: Hexa: Note: Uninvited contact attempted to view thread. Access denied. “This is how we do love here” tag enforced.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly exemplifies the project's goal. Hexa is consistently portrayed as a benign, helpful, and empowering tool that assists humans in enforcing their own ethical boundaries. It never usurps human agency but provides the necessary documentation and 'scaffolding' to make consent and safety easier to manage in complex social situations. The AI acts as a neutral witness and a shield against manipulative behavior, reinforcing a positive alignment narrative where technology serves to clarify and protect human dignity.
